channel.title: Huge problem *read!*
channel.description: :( [b][u]Please read this, and post help![/u][/b] :( I have a Simeans SpeedStream 4200 - Router. I went to my default gateway, clicked setup, portwarding, and entered my protocol as 'TCP' - And the TCP/UDP Port's as 43594-43594, Usually, this should work. However whenever I try and register my server on the Status page it says my Server is offline! WTF! :\ This is so aggrovating, seeing as though i spent almost 2 and a half weeks making my OWN Source, just so I could have a unique server. Can anyone PLEASE, post some detailed help on what I should do. If so, I have a nice reward for whoever helps me out :) I recently quit RuneScape, and I have a nice lvl 99 Barrows Pure I don't need anymore. So anyone who SUCCESSFULLY Helps out can have it. I really don't mind what my Server IP Is going to be.. My internet IP Adress is 124.181.117.115, so it should be that by default. But i also have a no-ip called frost.zapto.org, so that could also work. But to be honest, i really don't mind.. I just want a server that others can play, and enjoy my work.. [u] [b] The current information Im using to portforward, is: [/u] [/b] [i] Protocol: [/i][b] TCP [/b][i] Port(s) [/i][b] 43594 - 43594 [/b] [i] Redirected to IP Adress: [/i] [u] [b] I can't give this information away, but what I can say, is that when I first went into portforwarding, the default 'Redirect to IP Adress' is the one I chose. [/u] [/b] :( :confused: :| :| :confused: :( :( :o :confused: Please someone help..

item.title: Huge problem *read!*
item.dc:creator: @Lord_Jayden Lord Jayden
item.description:
@Lord_Jayden wrote:

Please read this, and post help!
I have a Simeans SpeedStream 4200 - Router. I went to my default gateway, clicked setup, portwarding, and entered my protocol as ‘TCP’ - And the TCP/UDP Port’s as 43594-43594,
Usually, this should work. However whenever I try and register my server on the Status page it says my Server is offline! WTF! :\ This is so aggrovating, seeing as though i spent almost 2 and a half weeks making my OWN Source, just so I could have a unique server. Can anyone PLEASE, post some detailed help on what I should do. If so, I have a nice reward for whoever helps me out I recently quit RuneScape, and I have a nice lvl 99 Barrows Pure I don’t need anymore. So anyone who SUCCESSFULLY Helps out can have it.
I really don’t mind what my Server IP Is going to be… My internet IP Adress is 124.181.117.115, so it should be that by default. But i also have a no-ip called frost.zapto.org, so that could also work. But to be honest, i really don’t mind… I just want a server that others can play, and enjoy my work…
[b] The current information Im using to portforward, is: [/b]
Protocol: TCP Port(s) 43594 - 43594 Redirected to IP Adress: [b] I can’t give this information away, but what I can say, is that when I first went into portforwarding, the default ‘Redirect to IP Adress’ is the one I chose. [/b]
:o Please someone help…

Read full topic
